newsitem.title: USA: Kirby Corp stake raised by Trinity group.
newsitem.headline: Kirby Corp stake raised by Trinity group.

text.p: Trinity I Fund L.P. and its affiliates said Tuesday it raised its stake in Kirby Corp to 2,721,536 common shares, or 11.2 percent from 10.1 percent.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include the purchase of 231,000 additional common shares between April 24 and May 5 at prices ranging from $17.92 to $18.77 per share.
Kirby, based in Houston, Texas, is in marine transportation, diseal repair and property and casualty insurance firm.
